<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Nhimbaloth](/Articles.aspx?ID=38)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 60</row>

Learn how the Outer God of swamps, despair, and will-o'-wisps, extends her seven-fingered hands into the world to work evil from the darkness of deep space.
name: Nhimbaloth
